participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Mike enjoys expressing himself through music. He often reflects on his personal relationships and has a laid-back attitude.
participant_1.background: My girlfriend tells me she’s going to leave me almost every day. I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books. I don’t like wearing pants when I don’t have to. My parents used to work in politics, until they discovered the goodness within themselves. I’m a really, really good guitar player.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Sarah enjoys spending time with her family and has a passion for reading and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is blue. I am 25 years old. I have one son. I was a wrestler in high school.

content.text: It's nice to meet you, Sarah.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my son.
That sounds nice. I like to play guitar, watch movies, and go to concerts.
I used to play guitar too. I was in a band in high school.
That's cool. What kind of music did you play?
We played a mix of rock and punk.
That sounds like fun. I've always wanted to be in a band.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I can imagine. So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go for a walk with my son.
That sounds like a good idea. I'm going to go practice guitar.
